summary: A collection of command‑line utilities for researching .gov domain information. One script gathers registrar details by querying WHOIS for a list of non‑.gov government domains and outputs the data to CSV. Another script fetches the current list of .gov domains, performs HTTP requests to each, and records the resulting status codes for analysis.
business_intent: Enable researchers and policy makers to monitor and analyze the operational characteristics of government‑related web domains, supporting compliance checks, data quality assessments, and internet governance studies.
